body.name: Heaboli 4K Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear, Wi-Fi GPS, 3 Inches IPS Touch Screen, Car Camera Driving Recorder with Night Vision, Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 40 mins
features: 【4K Dash Cam Front and Rear】Adopting advanced chip and top quality Sony sensor, the 2-channel car camera produces fluent 4K videos in front and 1080P videos for back camera. The image clarity is great enough to capture license plates and road signs in day and night.

【Built in Wi-Fi】Wi-Fi connection allows you to control the dash camera for car with your smartphone. We spent years developing “Heaboli” mobile app to ensure the good reliability. You are able to live view, change settings, edit and dub videos, download files and even share videos on social medias in real time.

【GPS for Live Speed Tracking】The driving route will be displayed on Google map during playback. And driving information such as driving speed, vehicle’s location will be revealed on the video stamp. You can play videos via the app on your IOS or Android device or on a computer.

【3’’ Touch Screen and Great Build Quality】The car driving recorder is equipped with a 3 inches IPS screen. The form factor is well designed and build quality is exquisite, especially the creative design of magnetic bracket enable the dash cam body quickly and easily goes on and comes off the mount.

【Sony Night Vision and HDR Technology】The dashboard camera is based on Sony IMX335 sensor, Sony sensor is capable of handling fine details. While HDR technology offers brighter highlights and a wider range of color detail. So the car dvr has no problem catching license plates and road signs even in low light conditions.

【24Hr Parking Mode】The built in 300mAh battery enable the dash camera to provide 24 hour parking monitor while the car is parked. When the car engine and the camera is off, the car camera will automatically turn on and record a 30s video and then turn off once detecting any collision around the car.

【Support SD Card Up to 256GB】The reliable car driving recorder supports high-endurance micro SD memory cards up to 256GB. The SD card needs to be U3 level or above to ensure the stable use of 4K dash cam.
【170°+170° Wide Angle】The front camera and rear camera records simultaneously in 170°,150°, which covers over 6 lanes, effectively reduce the blind spot.

【Various Working Environments】Made of quality ABS materials, Heaboli dual dash cam can work normally in extreme environments from -4℉ to 140℉, and will not fall off from windshield, no matter in the winter of Alaska or the summer of Texas and Las Vegas.
body.description: 4K Dash Cam Front and Rear Touch Screen/Wi-Fi/GPS/Parking Mode The car camera supports up to 256GB sd card (64-256GB, U3 level is suggested). Please Don't use Sandisk and Transcend Card. Please format the card before use.Parking Monitor without hardwiring: The dash cam has built-in battery, so you can turn on parking monitor to protect your car when it is parked, no need to use car battery. Resolution: Front camera: 4K/2K/1080P Rear camera: 1080P Image Sensor: Sony Screen: 3'' IPS, Touch Screen Storage: max 256GB micro sd card (64-256GB, U3 level is suggested). App: Available on Android and IOS, please search " Heaboli " on APP Store or Google Play to download it;

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Advantages of HP88 Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear 4K UHD 1. A-list premium budget 4K dual dash cam2. 2-Channel Dash Cam front and rear3. Wi-Fi Connection and Built-in GPS4. 3'' IPS Touch Screem5. Parking Monitor6. Elegant and Exllent build quality

Features of HP88 Dash Cam Front 4K + Rear 1080P 2 Channel 3 Inches IPS Touch Screen Support Wi-Fi connection and GPS tracking Parking Mode(with internal battery) 4K Dash Cam Front and Rear Touch Screen/Wi-Fi/GPS/Parking Mode The car camera supports up to 256GB sd card (64-256GB, U3 level is suggested). Please Don't use Sandisk and Transcend Card. Please format the card before use.Parking Monitor without hardwiring: The dash cam has built-in battery, so you can turn on parking monitor to protect your car when it is parked, no need to use car battery. Resolution: Front camera: 4K/2K/1080P Rear camera: 1080P Image Sensor: Sony Screen: 3'' IPS, Touch Screen Storage: max 256GB micro sd card (64-256GB, U3 level is suggested). App: Available on Android and IOS, please search " Heaboli " on APP Store or Google Play to download it;

4K Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear Heaboli 4K car driving recorder achieves the best results of shooting video at 3840*2160 Ultra HD, capturing your driving moment vividly as well as showing strong evidence once needed. Sony Night Vision Sony never disappoints you in capturing any details. It enables the dash camera to capture the license plates and road signs in low-light conditions. Waterproof and Rotatable Rear Camera The rear camera is waterproof. It can be installed outside the car as well as inside the car. The rear lens can be rotated in 270°.

Smart 24-Hour Parking Monitoring With internal battery, you do not need to hardwire it. The dash cam will automatically turn on and start recording a 30-second locked video when any collision or vibration is detected, providing 24Hr protection for your car. Easy to Playback Videos on the Computer There is an usb cable in the package, and you can easily connect the dash cam with computer. All files stored in the card will be read by your computer. You can also use a card reader if you have. Magnetic Bracket A magnetic bracket is a new design of dash cam mounting. Some dash cams use old suction cups, they often fall off. While the bracket of this dash cam is glued to the front windshield through a film, so it won't fall off. The dash cam itself is attached to the bracket by magnetic force, you can easily take off the dash cam from the bracket for downloading purpose and then reattach.

Support sd Card up to 256GB HP88 dash cam supports memory capacity up to 256GB to meet your need to record and capture hours of video on a continuous loop.We suggest you use sd card 64-256GB, please use U3 Level sd card.DON'T use Sandisk Card. Time Lapse The Time lapse feature provides an easy and fun way to record your adventures by compressing hours of driving into minutes of highlights, which greatly save space for your memory card. This can help to save videos for a long period time of recording as videos won't be looped so quick. Perfect to use it for a 7-day journey. Package Contents 1*dash cam(Front and Rear)1*car charger1*user manual1*GPS magnetic bracket1*USB Cable1*Trim Pry Tool4*Cable Fixer2*Electrostatic Film2*Double-sided Adhesive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cost perfornamce dash cam
reviews.reviewText: Follow up after few weeks.I had made several road trips after I installed the dash cam. The video quality is pretty good. However, you have to format the SD card from time to time, otherwise the emergency file folds could be filled and not able to keep latest incidents.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------My old 720P resolution dash cam started to show signs of aging after few years. With the worsen traffic and criminal records in Nor CAL area, I would not risk of going out without a good dash cam. My priority is a 4K front resolution with rear camera, plus parking monitor, as I read few "hit 'n run" incidents in nearby malls, including one from the Costco recently. I am not tech savvy enough to hardwire the power cord into fuse box for continuous parking monitor after power off, thus the one dash cam with a small built-in battery for few hours parking monitor became my first choice. Of course the price has to be affordable.After certain survey, I decided to go with the Heaboli HP88, which almost meets all my wants. The only concern I have left is whether the included rear camera cable long enough for my minivan. I sent an inquiry email to its tech support team, and gladly received its positive reply overnight.Upon receiving the new unit, I found the package was good ovre all. The manual was readable, installation guide was clear enough. Android APP was easy to download and setup, but could need some fine tweek. The included self-adhesive fixer and pryer were quite handy. I watched some Youtube clips, and had some knowledge before I started to install. I needed to replace the existing Micro USB cigarette charger with the newer USB C, which increased some extra efforts. Otherwise the total installation process was quite smooth and took about 40 minutes. I was worrying the length of rear cable, turned out I need to found a place to hide the extra 2+ ft excess cables.Have not started to do a road trip to test it yet, but hoping for the 4K resolution should offer much better video images than my previou 720K. I will do a follow up review after few weeks of usage if needed. So far I am quite satisfy with the product built quality, as well as prompt technical support response. Hope it could last another few years and never need to review the clips whatsoever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than other brand 4k model
reviews.reviewText: D200 has a better image quality than the previous 4K model I bought for the other car. I recently bought and returned a dash camera that claimed to be 4K, I don't think it was. This dashcam is leaps ahead of my previous one. When you open the box, you'll see that the D200 is well built and sturdy. Unlike other well known dashcams, it comes with a 64GB microSD card, so you don't have to spend extra money to buy one. Installing it is easy, all the tools you need are included. I really like the voice control feature, so you don't have to mess with it while driving or stop your car to press buttons. The voice commands are limited but work well. Also, the voice control is very responsive, and the dashcam easily understands all commands. The only extra thing you might need to buy is the 3-lead hardware kit to use the 24-hour parking monitor mode, I wish it came with it. Overall, it's a great dashcam with excellent picture quality and a sturdy build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for peace of mind!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this dash camera after a friend who has one recommended it to me. I drive seven days a week for work and after hearing about so many hit and runs in my city, I felt this would offer me a lot of peace of mind. It was easy to install and the wires were plenty long enough to hide within the interior of my vehicle. Hooking up the rear camera seems optional, as the front camera can be hooked up standalone and will record but I wanted both views. It works as it should and automatically begins recording once you start your vehicle, and stops recording shortly after you shut off your vehicle. There are also optional settings to have it record “emergency” videos if it senses impact while your vehicle is off/parked, when it wouldn’t otherwise be recording. Putting it in WiFi mode to connect to it via the app on my phone is a bit confusing at first but Heaboli Customer Support is fantastic and answered every one of my emails in a timely manner. Once I got the hang of it, I have no issues now connecting to the app to download my videos. The included SD card works just fine but does not support recording in 4k, which is the highest the camera offers, so I picked up a better SD card a couple days after having the camera and everything is working perfectly now. I also like that the monitor can be disconnected easily if I am parking somewhere I do not like to leave valuables visible in my vehicle. It’s a great camera and I have considered purchasing a second one for my husbands vehicle. A dash camera is the type of thing you hope you never need but will be grateful you have it if you ever need it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I installed this camera a couple of weeks ago, I was pleased with the ease of installation and the quality of the video. However the the GPS data did not show up with the video.The unit did not pick up the satellites, even though my phone clearly saw them.After corresponding with the friendly staff at the company, they send me a new base mount, which I installed last week. I now have GPS data with my videos, and can review a drive with the GXPLAYER that you can download to your PC. Good product at a fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality and Affordable Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: First off, this dash cam fits perfectly underneath the rearview mirror of my 2023 Camry. Due to its compact size, I can easily hide it in plain sight. The setup was pretty easy and it took me less than 30 minutes to complete. The camera can be used with the app and that was also very easy to use. After having the dash camera for a few days, I can confirm that the quality is great for the price point. Both the front and rear cameras capture license plates clearly. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a dash camera.Bonus points for the parking mode! The camera detects any movements and begins recording immediately, which is something I was looking for when shopping.
Funciona bien y es muy fácil de instalar
